blogPost.title: Of all the great novels of literature, how do you decide which ones to spend your time reading? Answer by @JanetFitch323 https://t.co/nrdgPi2e0L https://t.co/S1wGHQXjmt
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 文学の偉大な小説の中で、どのようにして時間をかけて読む作品を決めるのですか？Answer by @JanetFitch323 https://t.co/nrdgPi2e0L https://t.co/S1wGHQXjmt
在所有伟大的文学小说中，你如何决定把时间花在哪些小说上？回答者：@JanetFitch323 https://t.co/nrdgPi2e0L https://t.co/S1wGHQXjmt
在所有偉大的文學小說中，你如何決定把時間花在哪些小說上？回答者：@JanetFitch323 https://t.co/nrdgPi2e0L https://t.co/S1wGHQXjmt

previous.title: What should all startup founders know about getting funded? Answer by @SarahRCannon, Partner at Index Ventures. https://t.co/T7FKwQQOy1 https://t.co/5pBBeQbckh

localize.full_text: スタートアップの創業者が資金調達について知っておくべきことは？Answer by @SarahRCannon, Partner at Index Ventures. https://t.co/T7FKwQQOy1 https://t.co/5pBBeQbckh
关于获得融资，所有创业者都应该知道什么？由Index Ventures合伙人@SarahRCannon回答。https://t.co/T7FKwQQOy1 https://t.co/5pBBeQbckh。
關於獲得融資，所有創業者都應該知道什麼？由Index Ventures合夥人@SarahRCannon回答。https://t.co/T7FKwQQOy1 https://t.co/5pBBeQbckh。

next.title: What was the latest technique you learned about hiring new talent for your business? Answer by @brycegalen, Founder & CEO @Zero. https://t.co/keqd2fpNy3 https://t.co/Xg3kavRRXb

localize.full_text: ビジネスで新しい人材を採用する際に学んだ最新のテクニックは何ですか？回答者：@brycegalen, Founder & CEO @Zero. https://t.co/keqd2fpNy3 https://t.co/Xg3kavRRXb
